com.viaoa.remote.multiplexer

Class RemoteMultiplexerServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.viaoa.remote.multiplexer.RemoteMultiplexerServer

  • public class RemoteMultiplexerServer
extends Object
    Server component used to allow remoting method calls with Clients. Uses a MultiplexerServer for communication with clients.

    Different ways to create a remote object:

    1. Server can bind an Object so that clients can then do a lookup to get the object, and all method calls will be invoked on the server.
    2. A method that has a remote class parameter. This can be used by client or server - where a method argument is a remote object.
    3. A method returns a remote class. This can be used by client or server - where a method returns a remote object.
    4. The server can create a single remote object, that will then "broadcast" to all clients that have it.
    Note: OARemoteThread is used to process requests.
    Author:
    vvia

      • createBroadcast

        public Object createBroadcast(String bindName,
                              Object callback,
                              Class interfaceClass,
                              String queueName,
                              int queueSize)
        Allows sending messages to server and all clients.
        Parameters:
        bindName - name for clients to use to lookup the object
        callback - object to use when receiving a broadcast from a client
        interfaceClass -
        queueName - name of circularQueue used to hold messages
        queueSize - size of circularQueue
        Returns:
        proxy instance where all methods will be sent to and invoked on all clients see RemoteMultiplexerClient#createBroadcastProxy(String, Object)
